features: Bounty Napkins are available in White and Everyday prints
Picks up messes quicker* *vs. leading ordinary brand
body.description: Don't let mealtime messes get in the way of your family meals! Bounty Napkins pick up messes quicker* so you can get back to enjoying time with your family. Whether it’s saucy wings or spaghetti splashes, Bounty Napkins will keep you covered through the whole meal. And they're available in White and Everyday prints. So, keep it simple with plain white or change it up with year-round, seasonal, or limited-edition prints. You get to choose a design that best fits your style and kitchen. The 12.1” x 12” napkins are the perfect size to get your family through messes and spills. From family dinners to big celebrations, Bounty Napkins are designed to hold up for any occasion. They’re tough on those messy meals so they don’t mess with you. *vs. leading ordinary brand

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Don’t let messes spoil snack time! Bounty Napkins have you covered for any occasion.

Make mealtime messes fun with Bounty Napkins! Whether it’s crumbs on your chin or spaghetti on your counter, Bounty Napkins are thicker and more absorbent* to help keep you and your table clean. *vs. the leading 2-ply napkin

Keeping Forests Green. At Bounty, green has always been our color. But it's also part of our mission because we want to keep our forests green. That’s why we strive to protect, grow and restore forests every single day.

Keeping Forests Green. At Bounty, green has always been our color. But it's also part of our mission because we want to keep our forests green. That’s why we strive to protect, grow and restore forests every single day.

Protect. Grow. Restore. At Bounty, we make paper towels that pick up quicker. And we also help keep forests greener. Protect. We proudly help protect forests by only sourcing pulp from 100% third party certified lands. Grow. For every tree we use, we regrow at least two more in its place so we can continue to grow lush and thriving forests. Restore. We are partnering with conservation organizations to help restore forests and protect wildlife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Bounty Paper Napkins in White offer convenience and quality in every sheet. With 200 sheets per pack, this one-pack option provides an ample supply for various occasions.Made by Bounty, known for their absorbent products, these paper napkins are designed to tackle spills and messes effectively. The classic white color adds a clean and polished touch to any setting, making them suitable for everyday use or special occasions.Whether you're hosting a gathering or simply need a reliable napkin for daily use, the Bounty Paper Napkins are a practical choice. Each sheet is ready to handle whatever comes its way, ensuring a neat and tidy experience. Keep it clean with Bounty Paper Napkins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, good quality, our preferred brand of napkins
reviews.reviewText: RE: Bounty Paper Napkins, White, 1 Pack, 200 Sheets per PackThis brand has been our preferred family’s brand for years. I remember using these napkins growing up. They are good size and good thickness. They absorb well and don’t shrink or crumble after using them. We have tons of uses for these strong and durable napkins, so we like to keep them on hand wherever we are. I also keep several in a sandwich bag to take on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bounty is my fav brand for napkins
reviews.reviewText: Great quality & price. These are soft and thick napkins that you won’t keep needing more when eating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the best "everyday" napkins out there. They are so soft and so thick! They feel like super heavy duty, high priced napkins but are very reasonable in price. The only brand I buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They do what they are supposed to do
reviews.reviewText: In terms of durability, I find that these napkins hold up pretty well. They're not too thin or flimsy, which means they can handle spills and messy hands without falling apart easily. I appreciate that because there's nothing worse than a napkin disintegrating when you need it the most.The size of these napkins is also good. They're neither too small nor too big, making them suitable for most purposes. I find that one napkin is usually enough to get the job done, whether it's wiping your hands or cleaning up a small spill.One minor downside is that they can be a bit linty at times, but it's not a dealbreaker for me. It's something to be aware of if you're using them for more formal occasions.Overall, I'd say the Bounty Paper Napkins are a practical and budget-friendly choice for everyday use. They do the job when you need them, and the pack lasts a while. If you're looking for simple and reliable napkins for your household, these are worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These napkins are super absorbent and thicker then most, also they don't shred up when used I highly recommend them and I have tried multiple brands. Just buy these 100 percent worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and get the job done
reviews.reviewText: Never thought I would be too busy to buy napkins but these got me out of a pinch. Love the price point and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
